title: AFFORDABLE ONE BEDROOM WITH YOUR FIRST MONTHS RENT FREE!
map_address: 4901 Fairwood Blvd NE near Northshore Parkway
posting_body: ['MODERN LIVING Welcome to The Fairways Apartments', 'Seize your chance to live in one of the premier apartment communities in the city at The Fairways Apartments.', 'Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, comfortable homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.', 'Located in the Northeast region of the city, our Tacoma apartments provide easy access to Northshore Parkway and Hoyt Road.', 'The Fairways Apartments is just minutes away from the University of Washington - Tacoma, as well as all of the nearby shopping, dining, and entertainment.', 'We know you deserve the very best in apartment living, and our community is designed specifically to ensure you don’t just lease, you live.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 63', 'OR Text', '63', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 632 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Oversized Patio/Balcony', '- Cable-Ready', '- Window Coverings', '- Selected', '- Dishwashers', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Stainless Steel Full Kitchen Appliance Package', 'Community Amenities', '- Covered Parking and Garages Available', '- Located on Bus Line', '- Bark Park', '- Storage Units Available', '- State of the Art Fitness Center', '- Carport', '- Brand New Yoga Studio', '- 24/7 Emergency Maintenance Available', '- Park-Like Setting', '- Clubhouse', '- Convenient Location', '- Game Room', '- Updater Moving Partner', '- Brand New Equipment and FItness on Demand', '- Selected', '- Yoga Studio', '- On-Site Leasing Office, Open Daily', '- Playground', '- Convenient to North Shore Golf Course', '- Sparkling Seasonal Outdoor Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300, Deposit $400', 'Comments: Pet Rent is $25.00 per pet.', 'Restrictions:Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'The Fairways', '4901 Fairwood Blvd NE, Tacoma, WA, 98422', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'xJefcTmfM5']
